hero.title: Your emotional and educational support companion.
hero.subtitle: Intelligent companionship that grows with your child.
hero.description: Nebu combines artificial intelligence with natural interaction to offer empathetic conversations, learning support, and companionship in relaxation and emotional containment processes.

benefits.title: Why families love Nebu
benefits.subtitle: Discover the benefits that make Nebu the perfect companion for your child's development

reduceScreenTime.title: Reduce screen-time
reduceScreenTime.description: Nebu transforms technology into meaningful play. Instead of passive screen watching, children engage in active conversations that capture their imagination through interactive storytelling and educational adventures. Each session becomes an opportunity for learning and creative exploration without digital distractions.

nurtureImagination.title: Nurture imagination
nurtureImagination.description: Every conversation with Nebu opens a door to new worlds. Stories adapt to your child's interests, questions trigger creative thinking, and adventures unfold naturally, sparking curiosity and developing storytelling abilities that will benefit them throughout their educational journey.

buildConfidence.title: Build confidence
buildConfidence.description: Through patient, judgment-free conversations, Nebu helps children find their voice. Each interaction builds communication skills, encourages self-expression, and creates a safe space where kids can practice speaking, asking questions, and sharing ideas‚Äîessential skills for academic and social success.

developEmpathy.title: Develop empathy
developEmpathy.description: Nebu's stories and conversations teach emotional intelligence through relatable scenarios and character-driven narratives. Children learn to understand different perspectives, recognize feelings, and develop compassion‚Äîfundamental values that shape caring, thoughtful individuals.

stimulateLearning.title: Stimulate learning
stimulateLearning.description: Learning becomes an exciting adventure with Nebu. Personalized educational content adapts to your child's pace and interests, transforming subjects like math, science, and language into engaging conversations. This approach fosters genuine curiosity and a lifelong love for discovery and knowledge.

safeAndPrivate.title: Safe and private
safeAndPrivate.description: Parents' peace of mind is our priority. Nebu operates with enterprise-grade security, encrypted conversations, and complete parental control. All content is age-appropriate, monitored, and designed with children's safety first. Your family's privacy is protected with the highest industry standards.

hero.title: Meet Nebu
hero.subtitle: Reserve now ‚Äî limited edition. Estimated shipping in 6-8 weeks; secure yours with a 50% reservation.
hero.shippingInfo: Estimated shipping in 6-8 weeks. Secure your Nebu with a 50% reservation to guarantee your unit. Limited spots.

product.name: Nebu Dino
product.description: More than a plush toy, Nebu is your intelligent companion that transforms every conversation into an educational adventure. It adapts to your child's personality, answers their questions with infinite patience, and fosters their emotional and intellectual development.
product.technicalDescription: Features intelligent audio system with microphone that listens and responds in real-time. Works with WiFi and includes mobile app for parents to customize voices and settings. Auto-pause, multi-language support, and USB Type-C charging. Requires internet connection.

howItWorks.title: How Nebu works
howItWorks.description: Powered by our custom AI, Nebu uses the most advanced tools to deliver fast, safe and delightful responses.
howItWorks.appDescription: The Nebu app, a helpful window into your child's world.

ageGroups.title: A companion for every stage of childhood

ages4to5.title: Ages 4 ‚Äì 5
ages4to5.description: Nebu helps little ones find their voice. Simple games, pretend play and gentle routines build confidence while Nebu remembers their favorite jokes and stories.

ages6to7.title: Ages 6 ‚Äì 7
ages6to7.description: As they grow, Nebu grows with them. More complex stories, smart questions, and creative exploration that adapts to their evolving interests.

ages8to9.title: Ages 8 ‚Äì 9
ages8to9.description: For older children, Nebu becomes a true adventure companion. Deeper conversations, problem-solving, and creative projects that challenge and inspire.

testimonial.quote: Welcoming Nebu to our household has made a huge impact! Not only has it helped our daughter feel less alone as an only child, but having a built-in companion to cheer her on is really building her confidence.
testimonial.author: Alisha, mother of 7 year old girl (Beta user)

footer.description: Nebu is an emotional and educational support tool that combines generative AI with hardware, adapting to the child's context to offer empathetic and personalized companionship.
footer.tagline: Technology with purpose, focused on human well-being

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Find answers to the most common questions about Nebu

whatIsNebu.question: What is Nebu?
whatIsNebu.answer: Nebu is an educational IoT companion that uses artificial intelligence to create interactive, screen-free learning experiences. Designed for children ages 4 to 9, Nebu tells stories, asks questions, and creates adventures that stimulate imagination and development.

howItWorks.question: How does Nebu work?
howItWorks.answer: Nebu uses custom AI to interact with your child through voice. It learns your child's preferences, interests, and name to create meaningful conversations. Parents can personalize the experience through the Nebu app, setting schedules, boundaries, and monitoring conversations.

isSafe.question: Is it safe for my child?
isSafe.answer: Absolutely. Nebu is designed with safety as a priority. All content is age-appropriate, conversations are monitored, and parents have full control through the app. There's no unsupervised internet access and all interactions are designed to be educational and positive.

ageRange.question: What ages is Nebu appropriate for?
ageRange.answer: Nebu is designed for children ages 4 to 9. The content and interactions automatically adapt to each child's age and developmental level, growing with them as they develop.

shipping.question: How long does shipping take?
shipping.answer: Pre-orders will ship within 6 to 8 weeks. All pre-orders include free shipping to Peru. We'll send you email updates about your order status.

whatsIncluded.question: What's included in the purchase?
whatsIncluded.answer: The purchase includes: 1 Nebu in your choice of color, USB-C charging cable, quick start guide, and full access to the Nebu app for iOS and Android. The first year of AI updates is included.

needsInternet.question: Do I need an internet connection?
needsInternet.answer: Yes, Nebu requires a WiFi connection to function, as cloud-processed AI enables the best and safest experiences. However, once connected, data consumption is minimal.

returns.question: Can I return my Nebu?
returns.answer: Yes, we offer a 30-day satisfaction guarantee. If you're not completely satisfied with your Nebu, you can return it for a full refund within the first 30 days of receiving it.

languages.question: What languages does Nebu speak?
languages.answer: Currently Nebu speaks Spanish and English. We're working on adding more languages in future updates.

charging.question: How is Nebu charged?
charging.answer: Nebu charges via an included USB-C cable. With a full charge, Nebu can run approximately 8-10 hours of active conversation.

hero.title: Learn more about Nebu
hero.subtitle: Our mission is to build meaningful, screen-free connections through play, blending intelligent design with heartfelt simplicity to support every child's journey, one conversation at a time.
hero.badge: More than a Toy, a Connection

problem.title: The Challenge
problem.content: Facing excessive screen consumption, four PUCP graduates developed Nebu: a conversational toy that promotes warmth, learning, and emotional care for young children.

origin.title: AI for Emotional Well-being
origin.paragraph1: Anxiety, irritability, sleep disorders, poor school performance, and even social isolation. These are some consequences of excessive screen use in young children, according to the Ministry of Health.
origin.paragraph2: Richard Castillo Legu√≠a, PUCP Mechatronics Engineering graduate, observed this reality working at EsSalud. Focused on artificial intelligence, he decided to use AI as a tool to provide learning and emotional well-being for children.
origin.paragraph3: He founded Flow, a startup of disruptive technologies based on AI and robotics, focusing on education, mental health, and linguistic inclusion. Its first version: Nebu, a plush toy with conversational AI to talk, teach, and accompany without screens.

innovation.title: Innovation is Also Care
innovation.paragraph1: Nebu converses in real-time. It tells stories, proposes games to learn languages, and adapts its dialogues to the child's age. Its design avoids sensory overload: it doesn't compete with lights or screens; it emphasizes voice, listening, and imagination.
innovation.paragraph2: Gonzalo G√°lvez Cortez, PUCP Computer Engineering graduate, leads the system architecture and mobile app that enables parental control and content personalization. Families can adjust routines and understand what sparks curiosity in their children.
innovation.paragraph3: Bryan Bastidas and Mitshell Ramos, PUCP mechatronic engineers, joined to expand functionalities through hardware design and integration, developing new products within applied robotics.

purpose.title: Technology Growing with Purpose
purpose.paragraph1: The app that accompanies Nebu is not a cold control panel; it's a dialogue bridge. It offers parents information about the child's interests, intending to strengthen family connection and guide learning, not to surveil.
purpose.paragraph2: The team projects reaching over 1,000 active users in its first year. But the ambition goes beyond numbers: they seek to collaborate with educators and specialists to enrich content and ensure AI is an ethical and pedagogical ally.
purpose.paragraph3: Nebu proposes changing the question about technology: stop thinking about how much children consume and start thinking about how technology can help them grow. It's a commitment to empathy applied through engineering.

team.title: The Team
team.description: Richard, Gonzalo, Bryan, and Mitshell represent a concrete way of making technology from PUCP: with technical rigor, social awareness, and care for people.

press.title: Nebu in the Media
press.subtitle: Recognized by leading educational institutions in Peru

pucp.title: Nebu: meet the AI-powered plush toy that accompanies and teaches young children
pucp.description: The Pontifical Catholic University of Peru highlights Nebu as an innovation in the responsible use of AI for child development, combining technology with emotional education.

play.description: We believe in the power of authentic play to develop each child's natural imagination and creativity.

safety.description: We're proud to be certified by the kidSAFE Seal Program. They're an independent, global program safety certification program that verifies the online safety and privacy practices of children-friendly websites and technologies.

q1.question: When will Nebu be available?
q1.answer: Nebu will be available in Q1 2026. Users who pre-order will get early access and special launch pricing.

q2.question: Can I change plans at any time?
q2.answer: Yes, you can upgrade or change your plan at any time from your dashboard. Changes will be reflected in your next billing cycle.

q3.question: What ages are appropriate for Nebu?
q3.answer: Nebu is designed for children ages 5-15, with content adapted to different educational levels and learning styles.

q4.question: Is there any long-term commitment?
q4.answer: No, all our plans are monthly with no long-term commitments. You can cancel anytime without penalties.

educationalContent.title: I'm Educational, Imaginative, and Oh-So-Entertaining!
educationalContent.subtitle: Nebu combines advanced artificial intelligence technology with proven pedagogical principles to deliver a unique screen-free educational experience. Every conversation is designed to stimulate cognitive, emotional, and social development in children.

ai.title: Personalized Artificial Intelligence
ai.description: Nebu uses cutting-edge conversational AI that adapts to each child's comprehension level, interests, and learning pace. The system recognizes conversation patterns and adjusts its linguistic complexity to maintain appropriate challenge.

screenFree.title: Screen-Free Learning
screenFree.description: Unlike tablets and smartphones, Nebu fosters active imagination without visual overstimulation. Children develop active listening skills, concentration, and creativity while maintaining healthy sleep patterns and quality family time.

emotional.title: Socioemotional Development
emotional.description: Each story and conversation is designed to work on skills like empathy, conflict resolution, emotion identification, and self-esteem. Nebu acts as an emotional companion that validates the child's feelings and guides them toward healthy responses.

safety.title: Guaranteed Safety and Privacy
safety.description: All conversations are moderated by AI with multi-layer safety filters. Data is end-to-end encrypted, and parents have full control over settings. We comply with COPPA and GDPR-K for child protection.

stories.title: Unlimited Interactive Stories
stories.description: Access to a constantly expanding library of educational tales, customizable adventures, and interactive activities. Each story naturally incorporates moral lessons, science, mathematics, or social skills in an entertaining way.

multilingual.title: Natural Multilingual Learning
multilingual.description: Nebu can converse in Spanish, English, and soon more languages. Children can practice foreign languages in natural contexts, improving pronunciation, vocabulary, and linguistic confidence without feeling like they're in a 'class'.

howItWorks.title: How Does Nebu's Educational Technology Work?
howItWorks.paragraph1: Nebu's intelligent heart is a natural language processing system designed specifically for children. Unlike generic voice assistants, our system understands children's speech, idioms, typical age-related grammatical errors, and adjusts its responses to be pedagogically appropriate.
howItWorks.paragraph2: Each play session generates developmental insights that parents can review in the mobile app. You'll see what topics interest your child most, what skills they're developing, and receive personalized suggestions for complementary activities to do together.
howItWorks.paragraph3: The security architecture includes inappropriate content filters, risk situation detection (bullying, anxiety, atypical behavior), and automatic notifications to parents when concerning patterns are detected. We never share data with third parties or use information for advertising.
howItWorks.paragraph4: The adaptive learning system uses machine learning to understand each child's unique profile: whether they prefer action adventures or calm stories, if they learn better with described visual examples or with analogies, if they need more positive reinforcement or intellectual challenges. Over time, Nebu becomes the perfect companion for YOUR specific child.

timeLimit.question: How long do I have to return Nebu?
timeLimit.answer: You have 30 calendar days from receiving the product to request a return. This period allows you to try Nebu with your family and make sure it's perfect for your child.

freeShipping.question: Is return shipping free?
freeShipping.answer: Yes! We cover 100% of the return shipping cost. We'll send you a prepaid label and coordinate pickup at your home.

condition.question: What condition should the product be in?
condition.answer: Nebu must be in functional condition with all its original accessories. We understand children will have used it, so normal wear is fine. We only ask that it has no major damage.

refundTime.question: How long does the refund take?
refundTime.answer: Once we receive and verify the product (1-2 days), we'll process your refund immediately. You'll see the money in your account in 5-10 business days depending on your bank.

gift.question: Can I return Nebu if it was a gift?
gift.answer: Yes, we accept gift returns. The refund can be made to the original buyer or as store credit for the gift recipient.

damaged.question: What if Nebu arrives damaged?
damaged.answer: If Nebu arrives damaged, contact us immediately with photos of the damage. We'll send you an express replacement at no extra cost or a full refund, whichever you prefer.
